description: Detects the execution of the LOLBIN gpscript, which executes logon or startup scripts configured in Group Policy
author: frack113
false_positives: Legitimate uses of logon scripts distributed via group policy
name: Gpscript Execution
query: ((((process.executable.text:"*\\gpscript.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"GPSCRIPT.EXE")) AND process.command_line.text:("*\ \/logon*" OR "*\ \/startup*")) AND (NOT process.parent.command_line.text:"C:\windows\system32\svchost.exe -k netsvcs -p -s gpsvc"))
